ComicInfo.Summary: The creeps are coming for you. They're lurking in the shadows, and they're near enough to touch. They used to be content to stay out of the glare of the city's bright lights. But bad things have been happening-bad things that only the creeps can see. And only the creeps can stop. The creeps are coming for you and they're whispering their names: Eyeball, Gurgle, Booger, Chitter, Breaker, Gelulite and Mrs. Skank. And though you may recoil from them in horror, (italic)they(italic) are not the monsters. And one day soon, your life may depend on them. CREEPS is coming for you from the minds of acclaimed Spectre and Martian Manhunter artist Tom Mandrake and Blue Devil co-creator and Shi writer Dan Mishkin. The Creeps are coming for you in a tale that mixes horror with heroism...and its own weird brand of humor. Their first adventure begins here. Give yourself the Creeps!
